video1.title: Javascript for Beginners
video1.text: This video can be used to learn how to code with javascript so that you can create something similar to the site we created.

video2.title: HTML for Beginners
video2.text: This video can teach you how to use HTML, which we also used to create the website you are viewing this on.

video3.title: JSON for Beginners
video3.text: We used JSON to store most of the things you can look at on our website, so this video will help you learn how to do that as well.

image1.title: Cow
image1.text: We can also display images, such as those of animals or pets, like this cow.

image2.title: Frog
image2.text: Another example is this image of a frog, and he is such a cool frog.

image3.title: Groundhog
image3.text: We are also able to display different sized images, as seen with this groundhog photo.

audio1.title: Phone Ringing
audio1.text: We have included the sound of a phone ringing for demonstration of something that can be posted on our site.

audio2.title: Trumpet
audio2.text: We also demonstrate that things such as music/instuments can also be shared using our site.

audio3.title: Birds Chirping
audio3.text: Sounds from nature can also be shared if you find something interesting that you want to share.
